table.sql: create table cs_dz_chaxun_conf( conf_id bigint not null PRIMARY KEY, conf_title varchar(1000) default '', conf_description varchar(2000) default '', t_list_id bigint, t_content_id bigint, site_id varchar(250) default '', app_id varchar(250) default '' )

create table cs_dz_chaxun_dic( dic_id int not null, conf_id bigint not null, field_cname varchar(250) default '', is_selected bigint not null, is_query bigint not null, is_result bigint not null, sort_id bigint not null, site_id varchar(250) default '' )
create table cs_dz_chaxun_item( item_id bigint not null, conf_id bigint not null, item_key bigint not null, item_value varchar(250) default '', site_id varchar(250) default '' )
create table dz_search_customkeys( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, title varchar(1000) default '', site_id varchar(20) DEFAULT '', countnum bigint(250) DEFAULT '0' )

create table dz_search_keys( id bigint(20) NOT NULL, not null PRIMARY KEY, title varchar(1000) DEFAULT '', add_time varchar(20) DEFAULT '', site_id varchar(20) DEFAULT '', sort_id bigint(20) DEFAULT '0' )
